1482710.name: Samurai Revenge
1482710.description:
Samurai Revenge is an intense old school platformer with mixed RPG elements. Main hero is Kabuto - famous samurai which has been being imprisoned for 13 years. Now he wants to have his revenge because he finds out that his wife is killed. He knows who did this... And he is going to find him.

Samurai Revenge features thrilling moments and an unexpected experience. Maneuver through traps, lay waste on enemies who try to stop you. You will have great experiences with many levels of emotions from anxiety, nervous with the challenges to burst into joy when you win.

Features:
- Many levels to play in 3 different worlds.
- Discover the beauty of high quality graphics
- Upgrading your character's skills
- Challenge yourself with tough battles
- Combines the elements of action, hack-n-slash, RPG and puzzle adventure
- Become a master !
